QuestData.Title: Trial of Truth
QuestData.Description:
Those within our temple have left their past lives behind. They devote themselves entirely to Akunda.
Dis final test is perhaps de most important.
Dis is de moment of truth.
You will speak your name, as you will be known from dis day forth.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak your name to Akunda the Exalted.

Objectives.Objective: Speak your true name to Akunda the Exalted
